### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store the mined coal.

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0) with a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) as a potential source of coal for fuel.

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store coal, with a Burner Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) dropping coal into it.

### Coal Transportation at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5) that picks up coal from a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-81.5) and drops it into a Chest at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5).

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when chest is full
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining.
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the source chest has items to pick up before attempting to use the inserter.
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to use it.
